title: A little bit of all
content:
I am wanting to make a word collage for my husband, I only know of one font which is the Happiness, I believe it is Harrington.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415045721im_/http:/typophile.com/files/love_collage_3657.jpg-g2991-4294966526.png)
author: mamabear0604

comments.content: yes Happiness is Rosetti. Thank you. Once I figure out the main ones I want I will add your name. The happily ever after is one of the main fonts I would like to find.

"Happily Ever After" looks like Benguiat with some swashes added.

"Together Forever", "HUGS & KISSES", and "ALWAYS AND FOREVER" look like Felix Titling.

"IT HAD TO BE YOU" looks like Enviro.

- Lex

ScrapnFonts/SNF Classy Charm  
 [http://www.scrapnfonts.com/searchdetail.php?psku=11976](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415045721/http:/www.scrapnfonts.com/searchdetail.php?psku=11976)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415045721im_/http:/typophile.com/files/happ2_4253.jpg)

Robotic Attack Fonts: Girls are Weird  
 [http://www.dafont.com/girls-are-weird.font?text=Fairy+Tale+.](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415045721/http:/www.dafont.com/girls-are-weird.font?text=Fairy+Tale+.)
